pull.title: add explicit condition fo master fingerprint to be lowercase hex
pull.body:
Without [this](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25032) or [this](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25019) PRs going inside, core should explicitly state which hex representation of master fingerprint should external signer use (lower/upper). 

If one of those make it in - MUST should be changed to SHOULD

events.message: add explicit condition fo master fingerprint to be lowercase hex

issue.title: parse external signer master fp as bytes in ExternalSigner::SignTransaction
issue.body:
Some external signers scripts may provide master fingerprint in uppercase format. In that case core will fail with `Signer fingerprint 00000000 does not match any of the inputs` as it only works with lowercase format. Even if the fingerprints match, yet one is lowercase the other uppercase.

ExternalSigner::SignTransaction is the only place where it is needed IMO, as changing it in other places may break the communication with the external signer (i.e. enumerating with lowercase may not find the device).

events.body: NACK, #25019 is the right approach. Comparing hex strings is silly.
I'm fairly confident #25019 will make it, so you can close this.
Closing for now. Let us know if this should be reopened.
